titleStmt.title: The great prophecy of King William's success in Flanders: or, The happy fourth year of His Majesty's reign giving several famous predictions of the honour of England, in His glorious actions to be performed this present year, 1692. Licensed and entred according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at London; and re-printed at Edinburgh,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original at the John Rylands University Library, Deansgate, Manchester.
